It’s my dream To inspire others

I’m Terry Robb, a web designer with an affinity for graphics, sound, music and video.

Contact Me

Who I Am

I grew up in a small town in Michigan, and I have been playing with design since I was very young. My parents brought home our first computer when I was 11, and since then I've clocked many hours in front of a computer screen.

I’ve always tried to foster my creative side—trying my hand over the years at music, writing, filmmaking and graphics. To give some perspective, my very first website was a page filled with pictures of my favorite Pokémon.

Since then, I have worked hard on finding ways to create a great balance between creativity and technique, so that I might inspire passion and creativity in others with my work.

“Curiosity about life in all of its aspects, I think, is still the secret of great creative people”
– Leo Burnett Projects

Web & Graphic Design

Whether it’s websites, flyers, advertisements, banners or logos, I will design it... and I will thoroughly enjoy myself doing so.

Sound & Music Production

There are few things I enjoy more than being elbow-deep in an audio project. Songwriting, production, & foley are among the list of my favorite things to work on.

Video Shooting & Editing

I feel very in my element when shooting, directing, and editing video projects. Part of this is due to video work utilizing elements of graphic and sound design during production.

Mission

I love to create things. It's in my blood. I am constantly trying to make something that has a positive impact on others, and inspires them to go out and do amazing things.
